channel.title: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius
channel.description:
I came across this site this morning and thought it was brilliant. He's got quite the USP! Curious if anyone here knows him.
[theuserisdrunk.com][1]
[1]: http://theuserisdrunk.com

item.title: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius
item.dc:creator: NicheDiver
item.description:
Hey @jitbit, I remember (and really like) that video. I think “stole” may be a bit harsh though. The video is instructive while this guy is offering “drunk testing” a service. Both are brilliant, the latter perhaps a bit more opportunistic.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius

item.title: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
jitbit:

This idea is not new. He stole it from these guys.

No idea is ever (as in never, ever) original.

That’s why you can’t patent ideas, only the implementation.

item.title: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius

Though I do have to question his choice (as a UX service provider) to put white text on a black background.

He was probably drunk when he made that page

item.title: Anyone know this guy? Pure genius
item.dc:creator: NicheDiver
item.description:
Agreed. Did you see how he also offers his “sober services” as well? Ha! Great marketing. Though I do have to question his choice (as a UX service provider) to put white text on a black background. That always seems to hurt my eyes.
